ovdesc.p: The table stores the information of the type of Loan agreement documents collected from the customer at the time of loan processing. Information like Documents involved can be for Auto loan, Personal loan and Mortgage loan.

desc.p:
The option to select a particular loan type is to be provided. For eg: Secured, Unsecured, etc.
Validation Rules:: Allowed values are Yes or No.
A unique reference number (same as that of the appilcation form id i.e ID of the table EB.MORTGAGE.FORM1) which identifies a particular transaciton record. The id is auto-generated
Once the transaction is authorised this field cannot be changed.
Confirmation on the receipt of required documents. Allowed values : "Yes" "No" "None"

Identifies the Id of the customer, this is taken from the CUSTOMER table.
Validation Rules::Max 25 characters allowed
ID of the DOCUMENT.TYPE. The type of document is defined in the table DOCUMENT.TYPE. A drop down field displaying all the IDs of the table DOCUMENT.TYPE
